content: this trio of snowflakes pattern works up really fast and does not use much yarn at all great little decorations for winter time or glue them onto a plain card to make your own christmas cards or hang them as decorations i have also included tutorials for these snowflakes to help those who are yet not confident with written patterns enjoy crocheting kat more crochet made by me instagram www instagram com/lunacrochetdesigns facebook www facebook com/lunacrochetdesigns patreon www patreon com/lunacrochetdesigns youtube https //www youtube com/channel/uchq9t5_ralbec6tj8sgqraa
